4.subtask_description: Calculate the travel time using Google Maps from the office address (123 Main St, Brooklyn, NY) to the meeting location (500 5th Avenue, New York, NY).

1.handles: Calculates travel time and distance from the office to the meeting location

input_vars.name: office_origin
input_vars.description: Array containing the office address as the origin

input_vars.name: meeting_destination
input_vars.description: Array containing the meeting address as the destination

output_vars.name: travel_time
output_vars.description: Estimated travel time from office to meeting location

output_vars.name: travel_distance
output_vars.description: Estimated travel distance from office to meeting location

output_vars.name: travel_route_details
output_vars.description: Route details from office to meeting location
